page.title: Ex-Boeing Exec Sentenced on Conspiracy
page.text: ALEXANDRIA, Va. (Reuters) - The former No. 2 weapons buyer for the U.S. Air Force, Darleen Druyun, was sentenced on Friday to nine months in prison for negotiating a \$250,000 job with Boeing Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BA.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BA.N</A> while still overseeing billions of dollars of its business with the military.
